Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.gameplay

Class WarehouseDepot

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.gameplay.WarehouseDepot
public class WarehouseDepot
extends java.lang.Object
represents the stock of resources, from which they can be taken for the purchase of development cards or for productions

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private ResourceStack[] resourceStorage  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    WarehouseDepot()
    Each cell of the array represents a layer of the warehouse (resourcestack since in any case it cannot contain more than one type of resource).

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int getAmountByResource​(Resource Type)
    Given the resource type it returns the quantity in the warehouse depot
    int getLayerAmount​(int layer)
    Returns the amount of resources contained in the layer number 'layer'
    Resource getLayerType​(int layer)
    Returns the type of resource inserted in layer number(1,2,3)
    void InsertResource​(Resource resource)
    Try to insert in the warehouse depot the resource 'resource'.
    void setLayerAmount​(int layer, int amount)
    Sets the amount of resources that layer number 'layer' contains
    void SetLayerMaxAmount()
    Set the maximum capacity for each layer of the warehouse
    void setLayerType​(int layer, Resource Type)
    Sets the type of resource that layer number 'layer' can contain

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • resourceStorage

      private ResourceStack[] resourceStorage

  • Constructor Details

    • WarehouseDepot

      public WarehouseDepot()
      Each cell of the array represents a layer of the warehouse (resourcestack since in any case it cannot contain more than one type of resource). The cell 0-->FIRST LAYER, the cell 1-->SECOND LAYER,...

  • Method Details

    • SetLayerMaxAmount

      public void SetLayerMaxAmount()
      Set the maximum capacity for each layer of the warehouse

    • getLayerType

      public Resource getLayerType​(int layer)
      Returns the type of resource inserted in layer number(1,2,3)
      Parameters:
      layer - index of the layer whose content type is requested
      Returns:
      type of resource contained in the layer

    • getLayerAmount

      public int getLayerAmount​(int layer)
      Returns the amount of resources contained in the layer number 'layer'
      Parameters:
      layer - index of the layer whose content amount is requested : 1,2,3
      Returns:
      amount of resources in the layer

    • setLayerType

      public void setLayerType​(int layer, Resource Type)
      Sets the type of resource that layer number 'layer' can contain
      Parameters:
      layer - index of the layer whose content type we want to set
      Type - resource type set for the layer

    • setLayerAmount

      public void setLayerAmount​(int layer, int amount) throws FullResourceStackException
      Sets the amount of resources that layer number 'layer' contains
      Parameters:
      layer - index of the layer whose content type we want to set
      amount - amount of resources put into the layer
      Throws:
      FullResourceStackException - thrown when the resource stack is full

    • getAmountByResource

      public int getAmountByResource​(Resource Type)
      Given the resource type it returns the quantity in the warehouse depot
      Parameters:
      Type - type of the resource whose quantity is requested
      Returns:
      quantity of the requested resource

    • InsertResource

      public void InsertResource​(Resource resource) throws ResourceNotInsertableException
      Try to insert in the warehouse depot the resource 'resource'. If it can not fit throws the exception 'ResourceNotInsertableException'
      Parameters:
      resource - resource to insert in the warehouse depot
      Throws:
      ResourceNotInsertableException - if the resource can not fit in the warehouse depot
